description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Veg Couscous Bowl With Cheesy Trail Mix recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg & Veg Couscous Bowl With Cheesy Trail Mix Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 free range egg, hard-boiled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine couscous with carrot, cucumber, lettuce and tomato in an airtight container. Top with egg.

Snack 1: To make cheesy trail mix, preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Combine grain and malt syrup in bowl, then place on 1 tray. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Remove from oven. Increase oven to 200oC/180oC fan-forced. Spread parmesan on remaining tray and bake for 10 minutes or until golden and crisp. When cool enough to handle, break up both grain mixture and parmesan and combine in an airtight container.
Snack 2: Pack strawberries in an airtight container.
